name: Espresso Project File
summary: Learn about .ESPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The directory containing the ESPROJ file is used as the root directory for the website.

description: An ESPROJ file is a project file created by webpages creating software, Espresso. It is available on Mac OS and contains a list of the related files that are part of the website project. When you open the ESPROJ file in Espresso, it opens all the related files in the editor for editing or updating the source code. ESPROJ file also contains server publishing settings and other related user preferences.

Website project created by Espresso, a Mac program used for creating webpages and editing source code; saves a list of related files for the website project, as well as server publishing settings and other user preferences.
